cause.description:
The Weekend to End Breast Cancer benefiting Princess Margaret Hospital is an amazing weekend, September 7th - 9th, 2007, where thousands of women and men will unite in Toronto to walk 60 kilometres in a bold display of courage and commitment. It’s a weekend of hope, as we honour lives lost, celebrate survivors, and help bring breast cancer care to those who so desperately need it. The money I will help raise will benefit Princess Margaret Hospital, a leader in the fight against breast cancer. Its so simple to sponser a participant, simpy visit www.endcancer.ca click on sponser a participant, type Delia Martinez, and donate. Thank you for your support! Together we can make a difference.
1. One in every nine Canadian women will be diagnosed with breast cancer
2. The weekend to end breast cancer is your chance to make a difference
cause.name: The Weekend to End Breast Cancer
